overview: Thirty—year-old Muscovite Aiko's dad died, with whom she had not communicated for many years - he was a real monster, and she does not feel sorry for him. But for some reason she goes to Kazakhstan for a funeral, where she sees her dad's new family for the first time: her stepsister is unbearable, her brother is not of this world, her stepmother is the same age as Aiko herself. And the strangest thing: for them, Dad is not a monster at all.
title: Dad Died on Saturday
